portfolio.title: Book.it API

portfolio.title: Bookstore

portfolio.title: Ruby project
portfolio.description: It is console app that help user to keep a record of different types of things he won: books, music albums, and games. Data is stored in JSON files.

portfolio.title: Metrics web app

portfolio.title: Filmer app
